Package org.intermine.biovalidator.validator.fasta

Class FastaValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.intermine.biovalidator.validator.AbstractValidator
      • org.intermine.biovalidator.validator.fasta.FastaValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Validator
    public class FastaValidator
extends AbstractValidator
    A validator for validating Fasta file format. Default strategy for Fasta validator : 1. Validator will stop as soon as it encounter first error 2. Error enabled by-default 3. Warnings enabled by-default Rules : 1. First Line must start with '>' 2. Allow multiple sequences in a file 4. Strict checking for Nucleic-Acid and Amino-Acid sequences 5. Sequences letters must follow 'IUB/IUPAC' 6. Warning on exceeding 80 letters in a line 7. Empty files will be considered invalid 8. whitespaces and empty-lines are allowed and ignored 9. Each header must be unique 10. Rules for Nucleotide sequences:
